post.description: Import a CSV into a DataSet

parameters.name: dataSetId
parameters.description: The DataSet ID

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: The file

parameters.name: csvImport_{dataSetColumnId}
parameters.description: You need to provide dataSetColumnId after csvImport_, to know your dataSet columns Ids, you will need to use the GET /dataset/{dataSetId}/column call first. The value of this parameter is the index of the column in your csv file, where the first column is 1

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: flag (0,1) Set to 1 to erase all content in the dataSet and overwrite it with new content in this import

parameters.name: ignorefirstrow
parameters.description: flag (0,1), Set to 1 to Ignore first row, useful if the CSV file has headings

parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the Display generates up/down email alerts.

parameters.description: How long in seconds should this display wait before alerting when it hasn't connected. Override for the collection interval.

parameters.description: The direction for this transition, only appropriate for transitions that move, such as fly. Available options: N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW

parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should the audio loop if it finishes before the widget has finished?

parameters.description: Type of a clock widget 1-Analogue, 2-Digital, 3-Flip clock

parameters.description: The offset in minutes that should be applied to the current time, if a counter is selected then date/time to run from in the format Y-m-d H:i:s

parameters.name: showSeconds
parameters.description: For Flip Clock, should the clock show seconds or not

parameters.description: For Flip Clock, supported options: TwelveHourClock TwentyFourHourClock HourlyCounter MinuteCounter DailyCounter

post.description: Add a new Currencies Widget to the specified playlist

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The Playlist ID to assign to

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds for this Layout change to remain in effect

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base currency

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: Items wanted

parameters.name: reverseConversion
parameters.description: (0, 1) Select 1 if you'd like your base currency to be used as the comparison currency you've entered

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Effect that will be used to transitions between items, available options: fade, fadeout, scrollVert, scollHorz, flipVert, flipHorz, shuffle, tileSlide, tileBlind

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (1000 = normal)

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: A HEX color to use as the background color of this Layout.

parameters.name: noRecordsMessage
parameters.description: A message to display when there are no records returned by the search query

parameters.name: dateFormat
parameters.description: The format to apply to all dates returned by he widget

parameters.name: updateInterval
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Update interval in minutes

parameters.name: durationIsPerPage
parameters.description: A flag (0, 1), The duration specified is per page/item, otherwise the widget duration is divided between the number of pages/items

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Use pre-configured templates, available options: currencies1, currencies2

parameters.name: overrideTemplate
parameters.description: flag (0, 1) set to 0 and use templateId or set to 1 and provide whole template in the next parameters

parameters.name: widgetOriginalWidth
parameters.description: This is the intended Width of the template and is used to scale the Widget within it's region when the template is applied, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: widgetOriginalHeight
parameters.description: This is the intended Height of the template and is used to scale the Widget within it's region when the template is applied, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: maxItemsPerPage
parameters.description: This is the intended number of items on each page

parameters.name: mainTemplate
parameters.description: Main template, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: itemtemplate
parameters.description: Template for each item, replaces [itemsTemplate] in main template, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: styleSheet
parameters.description: Optional StyleSheet Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: javaScript
parameters.description: Optional JavaScript, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds for this Layout change to remain in effect

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Effect that will be used to transitions between items, available options: fade, fadeout, scrollVert, scollHorz, flipVert, flipHorz, shuffle, tileSlide, tileBlind

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (1000 = normal)

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: A HEX color to use as the background color of this Layout.

parameters.name: marqueeInlineSelector

post.description: Add a new ticker Widget to the specified playlist

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The Playlist ID to assign to

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds for this Layout change to remain in effect

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: Add only - 1 for rss feed, 2 for dataset

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: The URI, without query parameters

parameters.name: dataSetId
parameters.description: Filter by DataSet Id

parameters.name: updateInterval
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Update interval in minutes

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Effect that will be used to transitions between items, available options: fade, fadeout, scrollVert, scollHorz, flipVert, flipHorz, shuffle, tileSlide, tileBlind

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (1000 = normal)

parameters.name: copyright
parameters.description: EDIT Only and SourceId=1 - Copyright information to display as the last item in this feed. can be styled with the #copyright CSS selector

parameters.name: numItems
parameters.description: EDIT Only and SourceId=1 - The number of RSS items you want to display

parameters.name: takeItemsFrom
parameters.description: EDIT Only and SourceId=1 - Take the items form the beginning or the end of the list, available options: start, end

parameters.name: durationIsPerItem
parameters.description: A flag (0, 1), The duration specified is per item, otherwise the widget duration is divided between the number of items

parameters.name: itemsSideBySide
parameters.description: A flag (0, 1), Should items be shown side by side

parameters.name: upperLimit
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Upper low limit for this dataSet, 0 for nor limit

parameters.name: lowerLimit
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Lower low limit for this dataSet, 0 for nor limit

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: EDIT Only - When in single mode, how many items per page should be shown

parameters.name: dateFormat
parameters.description: The format to apply to all dates returned by he widget

parameters.name: allowedAttributes
parameters.description: EDIT Only and SourceId=1 - A comma separated list of attributes that should not be stripped from the feed

parameters.name: stripTags
parameters.description: EDIT Only and SourceId=1 - A comma separated list of attributes that should be stripped from the feed

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: A HEX color to use as the background color of this Layout.

parameters.name: disableDateSort
parameters.description: EDIT Only, SourceId=1 - Should the date sort applied to the feed be disabled?

parameters.name: textDirection
parameters.description: EDIT Only, SourceId=1 - Which direction does the text in the feed use? Available options: ltr, rtl

parameters.name: noDataMessage
parameters.description: EDIT Only - A message to display when no data is returned from the source

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Use pre-configured templates, available options: currencies1, currencies2

parameters.name: overrideTemplate
parameters.description: flag (0, 1) set to 0 and use templateId or set to 1 and provide whole template in the next parameters

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Main template, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: css
parameters.description: Optional StyleSheet Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1 or with sourceId=2

parameters.name: javaScript
parameters.description: Optional JavaScript, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: EDIT Only - SQL clause for filter this dataSet

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: EDIT Only - SQL clause for how this dataSet should be ordered

parameters.name: useOrderingClause
parameters.description: EDIT Only - flag (0,1) Use advanced order clause - set to 1 if ordering is provided

parameters.name: useFilteringClause
parameters.description: EDIT Only - flag (0,1) Use advanced filter clause - set to 1 if filter is provided

parameters.name: randomiseItems
parameters.description: A flag (0, 1), whether to randomise the feed

post.description: Add a new Twitter Widget to the specified playlist

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The Playlist ID to assign to

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds for this Layout change to remain in effect

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Twitter search term, you can test your search term in twitter.com search box first

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which tweets should be returned

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Effect that will be used to transitions between items, available options: fade, fadeout, scrollVert, scollHorz, flipVert, flipHorz, shuffle, tileSlide, tileBlind

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (1000 = normal)

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: A HEX color to use as the background color of this Layout.

parameters.name: noTweetsMessage
parameters.description: A message to display when there are no tweets returned by the search query

parameters.name: dateFormat
parameters.description: The format to apply to all dates returned by he widget

parameters.name: resultType
parameters.description: 1 - Mixed, 2 -Recent 3 - Popular, Recent shows only recent tweets, Popular the most popular tweets and Mixed included both popular and recent

parameters.name: tweetDistance
parameters.description: Distance in miles that the tweets should be returned from. Set 0 for no restrictions

parameters.name: tweetCount
parameters.description: The number of tweets to return

parameters.name: removeUrls
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should the URLs be removed from the tweet text?

parameters.name: removeMentions
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should mentions (@someone) be removed from the tweet text?

parameters.name: removeHashtags
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should the hashtags (#something) be removed from the tweet text

parameters.name: updateInterval
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Update interval in minutes

parameters.name: durationIsPerItem
parameters.description: A flag (0, 1), The duration specified is per item, otherwise the widget duration is divided between the number of items

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: EDIT Only - When in single mode, how many items per page should be shown

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Use pre-configured templates, available options: currencies1, currencies2

parameters.name: overrideTemplate
parameters.description: flag (0, 1) set to 0 and use templateId or set to 1 and provide whole template in the next parameters

parameters.name: widgetOriginalWidth
parameters.description: This is the intended Width of the template and is used to scale the Widget within it's region when the template is applied, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: widgetOriginalHeight
parameters.description: This is the intended Height of the template and is used to scale the Widget within it's region when the template is applied, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: widgetOriginalPadding
parameters.description: This is the intended Padding of the template and is used to scale the Widget within it's region when the template is applied, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: resultContent
parameters.description: Intended content Type, available Options: 0 - All Tweets 1 - Tweets with the text only content 2 - Tweets with the text and image content. Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Main template, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: styleSheet
parameters.description: Optional StyleSheet Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: javaScript
parameters.description: Optional JavaScript, Pass only with overrideTemplate set to 1

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Twitter search term, you can test your search term in twitter.com search box first

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language in which tweets should be returned

parameters.name: effect
parameters.description: Effect that will be used to transitions between items, available options: fade, fadeout, scrollVert, scollHorz, flipVert, flipHorz, shuffle, tileSlide, tileBlind

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The transition speed of the selected effect in milliseconds (1000 = normal)

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: A HEX color to use as the background color of this Layout.

parameters.name: noTweetsMessage
parameters.description: A message to display when there are no tweets returned by the search query

parameters.name: dateFormat
parameters.description: The format to apply to all dates returned by he widget

parameters.name: resultType
parameters.description: 1 - Mixed, 2 -Recent 3 - Popular, Recent shows only recent tweets, Popular the most popular tweets and Mixed included both popular and recent

parameters.name: tweetDistance
parameters.description: Distance in miles that the tweets should be returned from. Set 0 for no restrictions

parameters.name: tweetCount
parameters.description: The number of tweets to return

parameters.name: removeUrls
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should the URLs be removed from the tweet text?

parameters.name: removeMentions
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should mentions (@someone) be removed from the tweet text?

parameters.name: removeHashtags
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should the hashtags (#something) be removed from the tweet text

parameters.name: updateInterval
parameters.description: EDIT Only - Update interval in minutes

parameters.name: colorTemplateId
parameters.description: Use pre-configured templates, available options: default, full, gray, light, soft, vivid

parameters.name: overrideColorTemplate
parameters.description: flag (0, 1) set to 0 and use colorTemplateId or set to 1 and provide colours to use in templateColours parameter

parameters.name: templateColours
parameters.description: Provide a string of new HEX colour codes to use, separated by |, for example: #e0d2c8|#5e411d|#fccf12|#82ff00|#64bae8

parameters.name: removeRetweets
parameters.description: Flag (0, 1) Should retweets be filtered?

post.description: Add a new Web page Widget to the specified playlist

parameters.name: playlistId
parameters.description: The Playlist ID to assign to

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in seconds for this Layout change to remain in effect

parameters.name: useDuration
parameters.description: Optional flag indicating whether to enable the useDuration field

parameters.name: transparency
parameters.description: Flag (0,1) - Should the HTML be shown with transparent background? - not available on Windows Clients

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: The URI, without query parameters

parameters.name: scaling
parameters.description: For Manual position the percentage to scale the Web page (0-100)

parameters.name: offsetLeft
parameters.description: For Manual position, the starting point from the left in pixels

parameters.name: offsetTop
parameters.description: For Manual position, the starting point from the Top in pixels

parameters.name: pageWidth
parameters.description: For Manual Position and Best Fit, The width of the page - if empty it will use region width

parameters.name: pageHeight
parameters.description: For Manual Position and Best Fit, The height of the page - if empty it will use region height

parameters.name: modeId
parameters.description: The mode option for Web page, 1- Open Natively, 2- Manual Position, 3- Best Ft
